course_description:
This open-access conversation exchange site offers topics and conversation tasks for students learning Russian and English. The goal of this pilot project is to support exchanges between students in English-speaking and Russian-speaking countries. 

The conversation topics included are aligned with common college-level Russian language curricula, grouped by levels defined by {{% resource_link "f439f522-c0b8-4144-ab78-fbf8654fcbba" "ACTFL proficiency standards," %}} and utilize {{% resource_link "30df0523-a2b1-4e14-9f6b-e5dcf3d798b4" "OPI (Oral Proficiency Interview)" %}} practices. Topics include vocabulary, questions, and interactive activities that can be used in conversations as well as in individual practice.

{{% resource_link "785826eb-34e4-4a48-ab02-973993a4fafe" "Maria Khotimsky" %}} (MIT) initiated this project based on {{% resource_link "081db555-6189-4b61-badd-6c30ec6c09c2" "conversation exchanges" %}} between SkolTech and MIT students, in collaboration with Dr. Marina Alexandrova (UT Austin) and Iringa Kogel (Davidson College).

The Телемосты website is published under a {{% resource_link "b90ccfac-8a6f-4da5-8e06-31a8bd406dbb" "Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 (CC BY-NC-SA) International" %}} license.
